code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import styles from"./loading.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Loading(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.progress_bar,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.box,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.loading_text,children:"\uB85C\uB529\uC911..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.done_text,children:"\uB85C\uB529 \uC644\uB8CC \uD83C\uDF89"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.box_front}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.box_bottom})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("script",{children:"load();"})]});}function load(){const bar=document.getElementsByClassName("progress_bar")[0];let percentage=0;bar.style="--progress: ".concat(percentage);const interval=setInterval(()=>{bar.style="--progress: ".concat(percentage);percentage+=0.01;if(percentage>1){clearInterval(interval);bar.classList.add("done");bar.style="--progress: 1";setTimeout(()=>{useNavigate('/main');},2000);}},50);}export default Loading;
